sections.heading: Officers; reports; required; when
sections.text: A city of the first class may require from any officer of the city at any time a report in detail of the transactions in his or her office or of any matters connected therewith.SourceLaws 1901, c. 18, ยง 48, XXV, p. 251;R.S.1913, ยง 4836;C.S.1922, ยง 4004;C.S.1929, ยง 1
